data.lines: concerns what I am looking for

References is a list of characteristics for describing the property. Depending on the reference purpose, these references are used on the site pages in the search forms, in the forms of profile creation and listing submit.

This reference type is protected from editing. You can change its name and the list of its options. It is not possible to add new references or edit other references settings except those respresented as the references are used in the search forms on the site, in the forms of profile creation and listing submit.

Here you can set ther values of the parameters responsible for references display in the forms on the site pages.
In the field Type you should set the number of the possible answers (marked options) of the reference used when the form is filled.
Design defines the way answers for the references are displayed on the forms of the site:
  • Choosing select will make variants of answers displayed in the drop-down menu, for example
    (if the value of the field Type - one variant)
    or
    (if the value of the field type - multi-select)
  • If checkbox is chosen, all the variants of answers will be displayed in the form one by one and the member will need to mark the necessary variants of answers, for example
    answer 1 answer 2 answer 3 (if the value of the field Type - One variant)
    or
    answer 1 answer 2 answer 3 (if the value of the field Type - multi-select)
Order - the order of the references display (in the search forms on the site, in the forms of profile creation and listing submit).

Note: while the user fills in the section "My Preferences" in the listings the reference will be displayed with the following settings: Type=Multi-select, Design=Checkbox, regardless of the parameters set for thу reference. The case is that users references can always contain a few variants of answers.
Here you can edit the list of the values (variants of answers) for the reference.
